h1_title: Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough
content: You will also find that unlike the rest of Chapter 1, the Keeper's Shrine here sells a unique selection in the shop only purchasable at this Secret Area, and it's worth stocking up on the items since they're pretty rare for this point in the game:

This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_1_Secret-Ancient_Guanyin_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ancient Guanyin Temple'.
The content is as follows:
You will also find that unlike the rest of Chapter 1, the Keeper's Shrine here sells a unique selection in the shop only purchasable at this Secret Area, and it's worth stocking up on the items since they're pretty rare for this point in the game:
